content.en: Depression prediction: Researchers have been exploring the use of algorithms to predict and detect depression in various populations. They have used machine learning techniques such as random forest, logistic regression, and support vector machine algorithms to develop predictive models for depression. These models have shown promise in identifying individuals at risk of depression and could potentially be used as screening tools in primary care and other healthcare settings.
content.da: Depressionsforudsigelse: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer til at forudsige og opdage depression i forskellige befolkningsgrupper. De har anvendt machine learning-teknikker såsom random forest, logistisk regression og support vector maskine-algoritmer til at udvikle prædiktive modeller for depression. Disse modeller har vist lovende resultater i at identificere personer i risiko for depression og kunne potentielt bruges som screeningsværktøjer i primærpleje og andre sundhedsplejesammenhænge.
